name: Dragabs Smile Game
description:
I tried to remake the original tamagotchi game into GBStudio and now it's finally playable! 

"Smile game" or "Left or Right" is a simple game which you try to guess which direction your game partner will point to. You two get five tries a round. Win three or more times and you get a point!

Collect Points and little bits of the game reveal themselves to you!

(( Game will be updated periodically so more bits can be added ))
